long_description: The TYR Nest Pro high-performance goggle's design was inspired by Beijing's Bird Nest stadium design-they nest gently around the eyes. Nest Pro's frame creates a unique grid-like effect, similar to the way a bird's nest is intertwined for support. Frame features an over-molded, integrated nosebridge. Headstrap features patented Guide Clip system for easy one-hand adjustment. Double VTS (Varied Tensile Strength) silicone headstrap conforms to side of head, while flat back straps allow a secure fit. Wide peripheral CP (Cellulose Propionate) lenses feature imbedded antifog properties and are UV protected. Soft TPR (Thermoplastic Rubber) gaskets create a comfortable, water-tight fit.
short_description: The TYR Nest Pro high-performance goggle's design was inspired by Beijing's Bird Nest stadium design-they nest gently around the eyes.
